messages.noRefreshToken: No refresh token provided in request.
messages.usernameTaken: The username requested is already taken.
messages.usernameOrPasswordWrong: Username or password is not correct.

genericMessages.badRequest: There was an issue in the format of your request. Please check and try again.
genericMessages.conflict: The requested resource is not available.
genericMessages.multipleChoices: The request has more than one possible response.
genericMessages.notFound: The requested resource could not be found.
genericMessages.serverError: There was an issue processing your request.
genericMessages.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong processing your request

securityErrors.authHeaderMalformed: "Authorization" header in request is malformed. Please supply a valid JWT.
securityErrors.jtiMalformed: Token format is invalid, the key "jti" is missing.
securityErrors.subMalformed: Token format is invalid, the key "sub" is missing.
securityErrors.unableToDecodeAccessToken: Unable to decode access token, token type is invalid.

securityMessages.accessTokenUsed: Access token has already been used.
securityMessages.loginExpired: Your logged in has expired, please login and try again.
securityMessages.refreshTokenUsed: Access token has already been used.
